activities:
With respect to Synygy’s sales performance management services, Synygy, together with its affiliates, acts as a processor and does not control any personal information received from clients. Synygy does not choose or determine the type of data received from clients. Any access to such data is incidental to completing Synygy's contractual obligations to its clients as a processor.  
Synygy receives human resources data from its offices in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
